title: 140 Low Poly 2D Drink Icons  Hot and Cold Beverages for Games
description: Spice up your game with this diverse pack of 140 low poly 2D drink icons. From hot coffee and tea to refreshing cold drinks, this resource provides a wide range of drink
longDescription:
Spice up your game with this diverse pack of 140 low poly 2D drink icons. From hot coffee and tea to refreshing cold drinks, this resource provides a wide range of drink options designed to enhance your game’s UI, inventory systems, or in-game menus. Whether you’re developing a casual game, RPG, or simulation, this pack will fit perfectly into any genre.


Key Features:

140 Unique Drink Icons: A wide variety of hot and cold beverages, including coffee, tea, juice, smoothies, and more.

Low Poly Art Style: Clean and minimalistic low poly design, perfect for modern and stylized games.

High Resolution: Each icon is 512x512 pixels in size, ensuring excellent quality and scalability.

Transparent Backgrounds: All icons are PNG with transparent backgrounds, making them easy to integrate into any project.

Versatile Use: Ideal for gaming UI, inventory icons, menu designs, and achievement badges in various gaming genres such as RPGs, simulations, and casual mobile games.

Ease of Use:

Ready to use: Simply drag and drop the icons into your project. Transparent backgrounds make them instantly compatible with any design.

Optimized for Performance: The low-poly style ensures that the icons are lightweight, helping your game run smoothly even on low-end devices.

Flexible Integration: Works seamlessly with all major game engines, including Unity and Unreal Engine, as well as custom engines and 2D design tools.

Specifications:

140 icons in PNG format.

Resolution: 512x512 pixels.

Background: transparent for easy placement.

Feedback and support:

Since this is the first version of the package, we welcome your feedback! Feel free to leave feedback and share your thoughts or suggestions for future updates. We are committed to providing ongoing support and will continue to improve the resource based on user feedback.


For any questions or support requests, please contact: olgabutymova27@gmail.com
